data.title: Cooking shapes the structure and function of the gut microbiome
data.meta_description: Diet is a critical determinant of variation in gut microbial structure and function, outweighing even host genetics<sup>1-3</sup>. Numerous microbiome studies have compared diets with divergent ingredients<sup>1-5</sup>, but the everyday practice of cooking remains understudied. Here, we show that a …
